On Sun, 12 May 2002 01:17:47 +0300, Alexander Zynevich wrote:

>for example max(-0.0,+0.0) should return +0.0 if I test my own realizaton of
>max I will want to distinguish them :)

I haven't tested it right now, but shouldn't

assertEquals("check -0 and +0", new Double(-0d), new Double(0d));

do the trick?


Regards, Lothar
